about:
Littleghost9 


Hi, my name's Littleghost9, but you can call me your overlord or master, I'm fine with either. I'm not very well known, seeing as I have about two hours game time and close to 20 posts. If I am on the server, I'll be playing either Nebula or CTH. However, most of the time I'll probably be dying (my KD ratio isn't very good). I only have four friends at the moment, so if you're reading this and you're not one of the four, feel free to send me a friend request.
My Acheivements:
I have lived all my life without dying once
I can pull one eye in but keep the other still
I have killed someone
cheese
